1/ RIght side icon looks fine. 2. The top view is really clutterred ad bad how can we improve this? 3. Even when i click on ask mode it auto sends a message and i suspect it;s socratic mode?

1/ RIght side icon looks fine. 2. The top view is really clutterred ad bad how can we improve this? 3. Even when i click on ask mode it auto sends a message and i suspect it;s socratic mode? An option can be ton change theme [ Solid Blue Button: Teach Me ] [ Outline Button: Ask ] [ Icon: Copy ]. Also The "Copy" button adds a lot of visual noise for a utility function.

Change: Remove the text "Copy" and just use a copy icon (two overlapping squares).

Result: This reduces the width of the button group, giving "Teach Me" and "Ask" more breathing room and making the whole toolbar feel less cluttered.
